@loxyisme Oh Erin. I don’t know what to say to help ease your pain. Truth is, there’s nothing that will do that but time. I don’t know when that will be b/c at just over 3 yrs, it’s still there for me. Biggest of hugs to you. I’m here if you need.
I got family and friends in a loooootta places!
